Class DrawingFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ftdev.DrawingFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DbgControls, FrameControls, Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CafeWall, EquestriaMap, MapCanvas, MazeCanvas

extends Object
implements DbgControls, FrameControls

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void breakJump()
      In "step", "leap" or "jump" modes, this method pauses the execution until resumed.

      In "step" or "leap" modes, this method pauses the execution until resumed.
      void breakStep()
      In "step" mode this method pauses the execution.
      void breakStep(long delay)
      In "step" mode, this method delays execution for the given number of milliseconds.
      void clear()
      Clears the drawing to the initial state when it was created, removing any subsequent overlays, if any.
      void close()
      Closes the window.
      int getHeight()
      Gets the height of the drawing area.
      int getWidth()
      Gets the width of the drawing area.
      void open()
      Opens a window on the screen, displaying the associated Drawing and the controls for interacting with it.
      void repaint()
      Forces a refresh of the window content such that any changes that may have been operated on the associated Drawing are reflected on the screen.
      void setStatusMessage(String message)
      Prints out the given message in the status bar area, the lower right corner of the drawing window.

               throws InterruptedException

      • breakStep

        public void breakStep(long delay)
               throws InterruptedException
        In "step" mode, this method delays execution for the given number of milliseconds. It does nothing in any other mode.
        Specified by:
        breakStep in interface DbgControls
        Parameters:
        delay - - milliseconds to delay execution in "continuous" mode.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
        See Also:
        DbgControls.breakStep(long)

      • breakLeap

        public void breakLeap()
               throws InterruptedException
        In "step" or "leap" modes, this method pauses the execution until resumed. It does nothing in "jump" or "run" modes.
        Specified by:
        breakLeap in interface DbgControls
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
        See Also:
        DbgControls.breakStep(), DbgControls.breakJump()
